price: Биз уни арабий Қуръон этиб нозил қилдик. Шоядки, ақл юритсангизлар.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
